title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 341.11 - Examination procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 341.11 - Examination procedure

State Regulations

When an examination is had under subdivision (3) of section
13-k
of the Workers' Compensation Law it shall be by a qualified podiatrist at a
place reasonably convenient to the claimant and in the presence of the
claimant's podiatrist or physician, if in the latter's opinion his or her
presence is necessary. A duplicate copy of all notices of request for such
examinations shall be sent to the attending podiatrist or
physician. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
341.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
